text:
While on a [[plane]] with this property, a creature can fly freely, and all [[attempts|Taking Action]] to maneuver or move quickly use the [[Intellect attribute|attribute]]. This replaces all other forms of movement the creature possesses, and overrides any spell or effect that grants or increases movement speed.

See also [[Unburdened]].
title: Speed of Thought
tooltip: universal property: creatures fly freely using the power of their mind
